message.body: Btw, I don't remember ever exchanging names. I'm Wendy.
(1/2)My day's ok. A couple of things popped up in the morning which needed immediate attention, so it was a little hectic for a couple hours. Should ease out
Yeah, I've just known you as jetskiwr :P Hello there, Wendy! I'm Rohan. Btw, are you a big fan of water sports?
Easy day. No work. Running errands. Just hit the gym and now I got a 10 pm conference call
I'm Wendy and, yes, i'm a pisces and a huge fan of the water
10 pm? Wow! I hope you meant 10 am. You shouldn't work that late. Unless you're a DJ, which you are :P
(1/2)I find water sports fascinating too. Never really tried them, though. I'm more of a soccer/racquetball and used to play for my school/college. Now I'm
(2/2)merely a weekend league player. Do you play competitive sport, or just for leisure?
I played soccer as a kid and played Racquetball for fitness purposes but I don't anymore because I have a torn acl that needs surgery and repetitive side
-to-side movement is tough. But I do occasional distance races and i'm training for a half Ironman in Austin in Oct
As for water sports, I love to wakeboard and just tried wind surfing in the Dominican Republic. I also used to jet ski a lot as akid.. We had a Kawasaki
stand up ski. But I don't get the opp to participate in water sports as much as I'd like since I don't have a boat
(1/2)Yeah, my ankle bothers me a little too. I tape it up usually before running/playing racquetball etc. It definitely helps. You say you grew up in Florida,
(2/2)right? Did you stay on the coast or further inland?
